last_episode_to_air.name: Grand Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview: Live from the Grand Rex, who will be crowned Queen of France?

name: Drag Race France
overview: On the French version of RuPaul's Drag Race, each week, the queens are subjected to rigorous and funny mini and maxi challenges, and exceptional fashion shows that highlight their art. To keep their place in the adventure, the two queens at the bottom of the rankings will have to perform a legendary lip-sync to save their lives!

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: France searches for the Next Drag Superstar as 10 drag queens compete in challenges demonstrating their charisma, uniqueness and talent.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Drag Race France is finally back! 11 new queens will make their first steps in the Werkroom and show the world their art! Between Mini and Maxi challenges, runways, performances, and lip sync battles, the queens of this new season will have to show all the facets of their personalities!

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Drag Race France returns with 10 new queens, a lot of surprises, and LE-GEN-DARY new challenges!

episodes.name: Bonjour, Bonjour, Bonjour
episodes.overview: It’s the first day in the Werkroom! In the premiere episode, the ten queens discover the world of Drag Race France and show off their greatest talents in the maxi challenge.

episodes.name: Queen Pour Cent
episodes.overview: Today the queens will have to show themselves in a different light and play comedy in a parody of “Call My Agent.”

episodes.name: French Ball
episodes.overview: France, the country of fashion and chic! In this episode, our queens will have to accept a "haute couture" challenge and try to win their place for the rest of the season.

episodes.name: Snatch Game
episodes.overview: It's time for our queens to show what they're capable of in the iconic Snatch Game challenge!

episodes.name: Popstars
episodes.overview: 6 queens, 2 musical groups! Who will win the title of best girl band?

episodes.name: Un Parfum de Drag
episodes.overview: The queens still in the race have to compete in a very fragrant maxi challenge! Who will do the best advertising? Who will be eliminated following the lip sync challenge?

episodes.name: Sororité
episodes.overview: This week, the queens transform one of their relatives into their drag sisters for the makeover challenge!

episodes.name: Grand Finale
episodes.overview: The Grand Finale of Drag Race France will crown the first French Drag Super Star!

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: France searches for the Next Drag Superstar as 10 drag queens compete in challenges demonstrating their charisma, uniqueness and talent.

episodes.name: A Lé-Gen-Daire Return
episodes.overview: It's the first day in the Werkroom! In this episode, 11 new queens join the race and record Drag Race France's first anthem "We are légendaires" in the maxi challenge.

episodes.name: It’s Show Night
episodes.overview: This week, the queens take part in the famous Talent Show in front of some exceptional guests who won't let anything slip by!

episodes.name: Motor, Dragtion!
episodes.overview: This week, the queens must show their acting and comedy skills by hosting the morning show “Le Croissant Show”!

episodes.name: Snatch Game
episodes.overview: This week, the queens have to give it their all - humor, repartee, and more humor - in a bid to win this iconic game.

episodes.name: The Musidrag
episodes.overview: The queens star in a musidrag comedy, "Le Bossu de Notre Drag", which will have the judges laughing and crying!

episodes.name: Time Ball
episodes.overview: Time for the famous Ball! For this maxi fashion show, the queens take us back in time with 3 different looks, including a prom outfit they have to make on the spot... with objects straight out of a ‘90s/2000s teenager's bedroom.

episodes.name: Showtime!
episodes.overview: The remaining queens must form a girl band and shine on stage with an iconic performance! But the competition has a few surprises in store.

episodes.name: Queen Twice Over
episodes.overview: To earn their place in the final, the queens must transform rugby players into drag sisters!

episodes.name: Grand Finale
episodes.overview: In public and on stage at the Grand Rex, the finalist queens must put on a show like never before to win the crown.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Drag Race France is finally back! 11 new queens will make their first steps in the Werkroom and show the world their art! Between Mini and Maxi challenges, runways, performances, and lip sync battles, the queens of this new season will have to show all the facets of their personalities!

episodes.name: Voulez-Vous Drag Race Avec Moi Ce Soir?
episodes.overview: It’s the first day back in the French Werk Room! Ten fierce queens perform a cabaret number after writing the lyrics.

episodes.name: Talent Show Extravaganza
episodes.overview: This week the queens showcase their talents in a show-stopping talent show... in front of very special guests!

episodes.name: Ball Games
episodes.overview: It’s time for the Ball! Using athletic gear and accessories, the categories are “Olympic Flame” and “Opening Ceremony”. Plus a new twist comes up!

episodes.name: Céline Dion: The Rusical
episodes.overview: It’s time for the Rusical, inspired by the life of iconic pop Star Celine Dion and her different eras!

episodes.name: Snatch Game
episodes.overview: It’s time to play the Snatch Game! And for the first time in Drag Race France herstory it comes with a big twist!

episodes.name: Makeover, Ma Grande Soeur Drag
episodes.overview: This week, the remaining queens get to makeover senior members of the LGBTQIA+ community.

episodes.name: La Folle Journée Drag
episodes.overview: To get their spot for the Grand Finale, the queens will have to go through a journey full of twists and drag.

episodes.name: Grand Finale
episodes.overview: Live from the Grand Rex, who will be crowned Queen of France?

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Drag Race France returns with 10 new queens, a lot of surprises, and LE-GEN-DARY new challenges!
